packInfoListElem.name: %post
packInfoListElem.value:
cd /opt/echoes-alert/probe
tar xzf glib_echoes-alert-probe_squeeze_i386.tar.gz
tar xzf json-glib_echoes-alert-probe_squeeze_i386.tar.gz
rm -f glib_echoes-alert-probe_squeeze_i386.tar.gz json-glib_echoes-alert-probe_squeeze_i386.tar.gz
chkconfig --add ea-probe && chkconfig ea-probe on

packInfoListElem.name: %preun
packInfoListElem.value:
service ea-probe stop
cd /opt/echoes-alert/probe
 if [ -d lib ]
 then
 rm -rf lib
 fi
 if [ -d doc ]
 then
 rm -rf doc
 fi
chkconfig ea-probe off

packInfoListElem.name: %changelog
packInfoListElem.value: * Thu Aug 30 2012 Florent Poinsaut <florent.poinsaut@echoes-tech.com> 0.1.0.alpha-1\n- Initial release

packInfoListElem.name: %post
packInfoListElem.value:
cd /opt/echoes-alert/probe
tar xzf glib_echoes-alert-probe_squeeze_amd64.tar.gz
tar xzf json-glib_echoes-alert-probe_squeeze_amd64.tar.gz
rm -f glib_echoes-alert-probe_squeeze_amd64.tar.gz json-glib_echoes-alert-probe_squeeze_amd64.tar.gz
chkconfig --add ea-probe && chkconfig ea-probe on

packInfoListElem.name: %preun
packInfoListElem.value:
service ea-probe stop
cd /opt/echoes-alert/probe
 if [ -d lib ]
 then
 rm -rf lib
 fi
 if [ -d doc ]
 then
 rm -rf doc
 fi
chkconfig ea-probe off

packInfoListElem.name: %changelog
packInfoListElem.value: * Thu Aug 30 2012 Florent Poinsaut <florent.poinsaut@echoes-tech.com> 0.1.0.beta-1\n- Initial release
